message.body: Ingrid, i love you! I hope you find some time today to relax and push out all those other voices. I have full confidence that your baby is going to be healthy, and your pregnancy will get easier and that Alec and you will be happy together. Don’t worry about pressure from your father/coworkers, just try to enjoy your doctors appointment. maybe even try crying a bit...(GASP) it might feel like a nice release!

You have no idea how much this means to me or what perfect timing it was. Alec's mom freaked out at camper idea and told him he needed to man up and a baby needed a permanent home ASAP and he freaked and started having second thoughts for the first time last night right before our sonogram this morning ...it was really rough. He just deals with Constant criticism and Everyone telling him he isn't good enough and will fail, and it is starting to get to him. It makes me sad. I don't WANT a permanent home. Maybe never. I don't know why everyone is trying to force him into being a person I never even wanted and wouldn't want as a dad anyway.
So rough. Poor alec!!! How's the appointment???
Can I call
I just finished! Super cute baby totally healthy so far and very active! I'm 3 months and ￼
Hard to see in pic but it's little arms and legs moved and it rolled over and was so cute! Don't know sex yet!
Saw the little heart beating and heard it and it was so cute
I'll call later on! Taking Alec to lunch w me. I feel bad for him bc every single person he's told has told him he's making a mistake and will fuck up and he's not good enough as he is
I can't imagine going through that
The only People who didn't immediately tell him he was making an awful mistake was his moped crew
And his family except they're also telling him he is being a dead beat dad and needs to step up
(Step up to what? If he got a job now, he'd just have to quit in 4 months.)
Also he Has another job lined up!
I seriously have no idea what people even want of him
Everyone is just criticizing him All the time and calling him dumb and selfish
Omg that fetus looks like a fetus
Look cancel all those voices out. Ask Alec what he wants for himself and his child. You need to trust his answer and not listen to anyone else.

seriously, respect him and trust his ability to know himself. if you let those voices in you’ll be doing a disservice to him and your future with him. bc at the end of the day alec and you are building a life together. no one else is living this life but you two. so who the fuck cares
let those people live their lives
you have to live yours
wether you buy a camper or not
Yeah well last night he started having second thoughts and saying it is bc literally no one thinks he's good enough and now he's worried they're right
It was a horrible night haha but them the appt was good and I mean...it is too late!! He can have second thoughts but he passed the mark of when he can do that
Bc now it is happening haha
*then
How was your day?!
my mom doesn’t think its that bad
being on the road
And yeah my fetus looks like a fetus lol but sooo cute!!! It's little legs and arms moved
His mom flipped
And said he had to man up
Bc a baby needs a house and stability
A CHILD needs that
Once they start School in like 4/5 years
A 1 yr old can do whatevs

Why don't u wait and see.... My mom says that stability makes things easier. Just be patient. Work on one thing at a time. Focus on getting through this pregnancy. Don't discuss plans with anyone unless u want their two cents.
If you want to buy a camper this weekend do it!
you can also wait until after you have the baby... Campers will still be around.
I do think that that first month you'll probably be very tired and it will be easier to be at your dads.
Or at least the first three weeks.
And then, once you meet the little and you see what it feels like to be parents you can have done clout when grandparents are trying to shove words of wisdom down your throats.

Cause the thing is you don’t know what kind of parent you are going to be. or who that baby is going to be. Its like starting a painting right? you can guess about the colors and brushes you’ll need but often that stuff only gets revealed when you start the painting and it starts telling you what it needs. And also remember, your DAD LOVES YOU and ONLY WANTS THE BEST FOR YOU. Try to be kind and patient with him. Let him know you hear him and understand him, but let him know that when the time comes you are going to do what you need to do.
❤️thanks!!! Yeah I'm not worried about us at all. It is so hard to drown out all the negativity, with everyone telling us we are doing it all wrong and this was a mistake bla bla
My dad literally said I was making a huge mistake to choose to do this w Alec
And Everyone has told Alec he won't be able to handle it, except his mom and moped crew. And even his mom is like NO you need a full time job and Ingrid shouldn't be working :(
We need to never talk to anyone else ever again
What a bummer that he and I have no anxieties, and ALL our issues are us having to defend ourselves to everyone else
It's not like he and I fight or have any worries about this at all
We are just constantly being criticized. Him far far worse than me
It is so dumb. I am going to erase people from my life over this

Anyone that wasn't supportive and polite- anyone who chose to tell me or Alec that I was 1.ruining the planet 2.dumb and ruining my life and the babies life is being immediately cut out of my social media once i give birth and i will never speak to them again even politely
“What a bummer that he and I have no anxieties, and ALL our issues are us having to defend ourselves to everyone else” < omg this is amazing
This is trashy:
And his thighs look fat
